description:
This award is to reward you for both 1. reading the whitepaper and 2. sharing the paper with others that may not know about the project yet.  If after reading the whitepaper, you believe in this mission, movement, and community, then let's grow by organically sharing it with your friends and family that need to hear that a sustainable revolution is possible.

Our whitepaper is available in our discord.  link: https://discord.com/invite/XUDEfwS8h6
Especially important to share on your social media and email to connect as many people as possible to the vision.
name: I read the Project Whitepaper that is located in the HOME DAO discord.
